title: About
intro: ValorForge Solutions is a veteran-owned SDVOSB founded by retired senior military leadership and a seasoned executive team with extensive experience IT Project delivery

items.title: Mission
items.body: To forge durable, high-confidence technology outcomes for organizations whose missions cannot fail.

items.title: Vision Statement
items.body: A world where mission-led teams confidently harness technology and AI, grounded in trust, discipline, and alignment.
